page.title: 11FARMING - DAILY ROUTINE.
page.content: them decided to lift its tail and do all its necessaries whilst Diane was in the way, (she got an eye full of cow dung.) On each side we had to get six cows and get them ready for milking. Once we had finished milking the cows we had to swill out the two sides where they had been milked, for about two hours, maybe more, (milking starts at 4.00pm and finishes between 6.00 and 7.00pm.) At about 5.30pm{Mrs. Chapman}brought us some tea, a bun and a biscuit. They were soon finished, we were very hungry. At exactly 6.55pm we started for home, by having a lift, from{ {Mr.Chapman}in his bright yellow Rover. I enjoyed my day greatly and would not mind spending another day with a farmer.
